title: bad customer service
body: so a couple months ago i was trying to gift my GF a skin. she was just getting into the game and had really taken a liking to sona. so i decided to buy her the sweetheart sona skin. while looking at skins in the gifting section i wanted to make sure that was the one she wanted so i pressed the little (_i_) button for info to make the picture bigger. little did i know that pressing that changes it from buying it as a gift to buying it for yourself. since i had just come from the GIFTING section i thought it was still gifting. so i bought it. now i own a skin i dont want (i have the DJ sona skin....) and riot wont refund the RP because they show that i bought it intentionally. wont listen to reason about their system having a small flaw. just venting since riot wont help me in any way. hopefully non of u get shafted like me trying to bring new players into our fun world

replies.body:
I don't really understand how the purchasing center somehow switched to a personal purchase, or potentially bypassing confirmation windows before the purchase.  Each account is also allotted 3 refund tokens in cases of mistakes or accidents, which would allow you to refund the self-purchase per the [refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).   

That said, it does sound like you went through a bit of a roller coaster.  I admire your intent to gift your girlfriend, and even sharing your experience here.  I promise we have no intention to shaft anyone.  Kappa.  Each situation is unique, and after reviewing your specific issue I'd like our support team to take another look at a few points to advocate for.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and while I can't make guarantees we'll see what we can do for you.  :)  Hang tight, and we'll respond asap!
